description: The Tommi Mäkinen Edition — named after the four-time WRC champion who proved that a sedan from a mid-tier Japanese manufacturer could embarrass purpose-built rally cars. Active yaw control, aggressive aero, and a 4G63 that responds to boost like it was born for it.
lore: Tommi Mäkinen didn't just win rallies in the Evo — he made them look easy. The TME edition carries that energy. In Nova Pacifica's rain-soaked mountain passes, there's nothing that puts power down more confidently than an Evo VI at full boost.
